授業目的: Research Seminar will allow students to conduct research and analyses on themes of their own choices.
到達目標: Through group and individual guidance and consultation with the faculty, the students will carry out research/analyses on their interested research theme. Students will update and revise their research proposal (that they had submitted at the end of the first year (Research Seminar 1) and submit final version of research proposal in the first part (Spring semester) of Research Seminar 2. In the second part of Research Seminar (Fall), students complete their theses after several revisions and consultations with the instructor.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: Introduction to Financial Accounting, International Accounting, Financial Reporting and Analysis, Corporate Finance.
